DOC.brief_summary: The goal study pilot test group overweight-obese individual feasibility acceptability indication efficacy two CAM treatment , qigong , acupressure-TAT , improve long term maintenance weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Study Two Complementary Alternative Medical Treatments Maintenance Weight Loss
DOC.detailed_description: The prevalence obesity epidemic proportion , 60 % US adult overweight obese . Obesity contribute chronic disease ( diabetes , cardiovascular disease [ CVD ] , hypertension , cancer , osteoarthritis ) escalate health care cost . Weight loss substantial impact reduce condition . Substantial effort make develop effective short-term weight loss program use behavioral treatment . However , long-term maintenance weight loss continue problematic - many individual regain weight lose within year . Innovative intervention option critically need help people successfully maintain weight loss fight obesity epidemic . Complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) approaches-mind-body , energy healing , Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) approach may hold great promise help improve maintenance weight loss .
